CustomField.description: Oracle Receivables uses this value to determine if the Deferral is Advance or if the billing is in Arrears, in case of a -ive Amount value, this value should be Blank
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Oracle Receivables uses this value to determine if the Deferral is Advance or if the billing is in Arrears, in case of a -ive Amount value, this value should be Blank
CustomField.label: Accounting Rule Name
